    (constant) discoverIssuerWithRetries

    Function to discover the openid issuer, with retries. the Issuer.discover function exposed by openid-client will break if the issuer is not discovered. This custom function will retry a specified number of times before failing, avoiding crashing when there is a small network hiccup. The try/catch block is necessary because if a non-url is passed to Issuer.discover, it will break
    Source:
    • auth.js, line 87
